label: Supply Chain Control Tower
description: Provides end-to-end supply chain visibility with real-time exception detection, impact analysis, and automated resolution coordination.

traditionalApproach.description: No end-to-end visibility with reactive issue discovery and manual coordination
characteristics: No end-to-end visibility
Each party (suppliers, 3PLs, carriers) uses own system
Delays discovered reactively
Manual coordination when issues arise
constraints: Blind spots across supply chain partners
Reactive discovery of delays and issues
Manual status calls and email chasing
Slow response to exceptions (days to coordinate)

agenticApproach.description: End-to-end visibility with early exception detection, automated impact analysis, and coordinated resolutions
characteristics: Multi-tier visibility tracks inventory, orders, shipments across all partners
Exception detection identifies delays, stock-outs, quality issues in real-time
Impact analysis calculates downstream effects (revenue, customer, operations)
Resolution orchestration coordinates responses (expedite, re-route, notify)
Integration with all supply chain systems (ERP, WMS, TMS, supplier portals)
Predictive alerts before issues occur
benefits: Exceptions detected in real-time vs reactive discovery
Impact quantified automatically vs manual assessment
Resolutions coordinated automatically vs email chains

Decisions made in weeks vs months of analysis
Agility to respond to market shifts
